name: Controladora Vuela Compañía de Aviación, S.A.B. de C.V.
description: Controladora Vuela Compañía de Aviación, S.A.B. de C.V., commonly known as Volaris, is a leading low-cost airline based in Mexico. Founded in 2005, Volaris has established itself as a major player in the Latin American aviation market by offering affordable and accessible air travel options for both leisure and business travelers. The airline operates a modern fleet of Airbus A320 family aircraft, providing extensive routes connecting Mexico to various destinations in the United States, Central America, and domestic locations across Mexico. Volaris is known for its commitment to customer service and operational efficiency, allowing it to maintain competitive fare structures while delivering a reliable flying experience. As a pioneer in the low-cost carrier segment in Mexico, Volaris has embraced innovative marketing strategies and technology to enhance customer engagement and streamline operations. The company's mission focuses on democratizing air travel, making it possible for more people to fly affordably. In addition to passenger services, Volaris also offers cargo transportation, contributing to the logistics and trade sectors within its operational regions.
